Author: SweatshirtHoe
Text: I'm not religious at ALL, but my family is. I just tell them I'm avoiding whatever I decide that year to be closer to the family. It makes them feel better and I can avoid things and not have people worry. I love lent

Author: tearsandwanderlust
Text: Yes yes and yes. I relate to this so badly. I am actually quite religious and my sisters usually just stop eating meat during lent but the past few years I’ve always gone a bit more extreme than that. The “public excuse” part is like a double edge sword. Makes me feel lonelier but less judged by family members/friends. You are NOT alone!!🤍
